name: Chronicles Unfound
description:
(This is a test version of the game, as the project was not build with WebGL in mind, resulting in a few UX issues. If you want to play the game with full settings and anything past the Tutorial, please download the game from the link here: Project Township BETA Test v1.2.zip - Google Drive )

Chronicles Unfound is a low poly open-world RPG that emphasizes the freedom of exploration, character customization, intense combat, and making impactful choices that affect your story.

We have effectively realized our vision for the first free-roam area of the game, the Lonely Valley, as well as the cinematic tutorial dungeon.  This comprises the Demo for our game.
